channel.title: Server Connection Problen
channel.description:
Huff, I can log in to Moparscape but after 30 seconds It says Connection Problem. Trying To Reconnect. And then I get logged out and can't log in again. What has really happend? Because everytime I turn of the program and turn it on again I can play for 30 seconds, after that the same thing happends.
Yes, I have a good connection with everything else. Yes, I have the newest version of Java.

item.title: Server Connection Problen
item.dc:creator: @2ced 2ced
item.description:
@2ced wrote:

problems kinda solved caus for some reason ms created a new char for me and now it works, but I find it kind of boring to play all on my own, how do I get in to a server with other people?

Read full topic
